name: List Plugins
author: SedLex

sections.description:
Create a list of the active plugins in a page (when the shortcode [list_plugins] is found).

The list may contain:

  • the name of the plugin,
  • the description,
  • the version,
  • the screenshots,
  • a link to download the zip file of the current version.

Plugin developped from the orginal plugin WP-PluginsUsed.

This plugin is under GPL licence.

Multisite – WordPress MU

This plugin supports multi-site installation

Localization

  • German (Germany) translation provided by MarkusBloch, solist
  • English (United States), default language
  • French (France) translation provided by SedLex

Features of the framework

This plugin uses the SL framework. This framework eases the creation of new plugins by providing tools and frames (see dev-toolbox plugin for more info).

You may easily translate the text of the plugin and submit it to the developer, send a feedback, or choose the location of the plugin in the admin panel.

Have fun !
sections.installation:
1. Upload this folder list-plugins to your plugin directory (for instance ‘/wp-content/plugins/’)
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Navigate to the ‘SL plugins’ box
  4. All plugins developed with the SL core will be listed in this box
  5. Enjoy !
